description:
[b]Official presets can only publish FLomka and Digidro, if someone puts out presets marked as CWAV, please inform me on Steam: FLomka or Discord: FLomka#0202. (Developed by RedFox)[/b]

[h1]Update 1.9 Spotify Connect[/h1]

[b] - Spotify Connect - [/b]
‚Äî Added listening to your current track on Spotify.
[img] https://i.imgur.com/HCMkHWp.gif [/img]
[img] https://i.imgur.com/N72pjQa.gif [/img]
‚Äî Use and change only what you need, complete freedom of action.
[img] https://i.imgur.com/aQGpUgE.gif [/img]
[img] https://i.imgur.com/UOONkq0.gif [/img]
‚Äî Protection from NSFW content.
[img] https://i.imgur.com/MhN5Q6e.gif [/img]
‚Äî Hide on pause.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/o1ymZyT.gif[/img]
‚Äî Use the colors of the music.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Nao5zcj.gif[/img]
‚Äî Use music colors on weather and text block (time, date, equalizer, particles in the future).[img]https://i.imgur.com/4a7vPec.gif[/img]

[b] - New design menu - [/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1hILKOC.gif[/img]

You can always offer your improvements to us and we will certainly listen to you.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/discussion/1509243786/2140840224668431912/]FaQ & Guide[/url]
Developed by RedFox Inc.
[url=discord.gg/KuNA3cu][img] https://i.imgur.com/eKVpVwd.png [/img][/url]

You can support me on:
[url=paypal.me/FLomka][img] https://i.imgur.com/4wHcKGl.png [/img][/url][url=patreon.com/FLomka][img] https://i.imgur.com/S2CVIpa.png [/img][/url]

en-us.ui_background_mode_video_text: <small>‚òÖVideo must be in the WebM format.</small>
en-us.ui_time_date_text:
‚òÖYou can change date format manually
{DD} {MM} {YYYY}
{week} {wek} {month} {,}
For example:{month} {DD}
–†–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç: September 20
en-us.ui_weather_format_text:
‚òÖYou can change weather format manually
{city} {temp} {feels} {,}
{pressure} {wind} {winddir} {uv_index}
{weather} {precip} {humidity} {visibility}
For example: {temp}‚ÑÉ, feels {feels}‚ÑÉ and now {weather}
Result: 26‚ÑÉ, feels 24‚ÑÉ and now Cloudy
